record.title: Always validate user input before database queries
record.content:
SQL injection remains one of the most common vulnerabilities. Even with ORMs, raw queries can slip through. Always:

1. Use parameterized queries
2. Validate input types before processing
3. Escape special characters when parameterization isn't possible
4. Use allowlists for dynamic column/table names

This applies to all databases, not just SQLâ€”NoSQL injection is real too.
